title: Hackathon 2025
description: 24-hour coding event with prizes and mentorship.
details: Form a team or join solo, solve real-world problems, and compete for exciting prizes. Mentors from top tech companies will be available throughout the event. Meals and snacks provided.

title: Music Fest
description: Evening of live performances, food stalls and games.
details: Enjoy live bands, solo artists, and DJ sets. Food trucks and fun games will be available for all. Bring your friends and dance the night away under the stars.

title: Tech Conference
description: A gathering of industry leaders to discuss the future of technology.
details: Keynote speeches, panel discussions, and networking sessions with industry experts. Open to all students and faculty. Certificates for all attendees.

title: Art Exhibition
description: Showcasing local artists and their latest works.
details: Paintings, sculptures, and digital art from students and local artists. Vote for your favorite piece. Art supplies and refreshments provided.

title: Sports Meet
description: Annual sports competition for all departments.
details: Track and field, football, basketball, and more. Departmental teams compete for the championship trophy. Medals and certificates for winners.

title: Literature Fest
description: Celebrating literature with talks, readings, and workshops.
details: Meet published authors, participate in poetry slams, and attend creative writing workshops. Book stalls and open mic sessions throughout the day.
